name: FNF (Fan Need Funds) NFT b̶o̶o̶t̶l̶e̶g̶
description:
In the last science class, Fan learnt about energy sources and that blockchains consume lots of eletric energy

At 5champ, he learnt about the mountains of money he could make with his crypto and blockchain: UnCoin.

Dreaming during the class, instead of becaming a crypto bro, he see all his energy source blocked with chains. Help him generate enough energy with clean sources (no fossil here!) so he can light the city and mine some coins!

How to play:

Use directional butons or wasd to play

Disclaim: 

1 - The game will be balanced by the end of the submission deadline. Then we won't update the game.

2 -  all our assets are MFT (mock free token). You can right click all you want (but some donation would be nice ;). 


Jaspior: Art direction, Some polish

KeichTS: Programing
